mapper.insert: insert into XCSB (RWMX_ID, RWMX_MID, RWMX_DWMC, RWMX_DWBH, RWMX_DWID, RWMX_BMMC, RWMX_BMBH, RWMX_BMID, RWMX_TBR, RWMX_TBRID, RWMX_TBRQ, RWMX_NOTE, RWMX_SJDH, RWMX_GPS, RWMX_SJLX, RWMX_SJSM, RWMX_JJD, RWMX_TP, RWMX_SP, RWMX_ZH, RWMX_FXSJ, RWMX_SHLX, RWMX_BHLX, RWMX_BHSL, RWMX_KHNR, RWMX_CD, RWMX_CZFS ) values (#{rwmxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxMid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxDwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxDwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxDwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxBmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxBmbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxBmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxTbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxTbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxTbrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rwmxNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxSjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxGps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxSjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxSjsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxJjd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxTp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxSp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxZh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxFxsj,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rwmxShlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxBhlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxBhsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rwmxKhnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwmxCzfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select RWMX_ID, RWMX_MID, RWMX_DWMC, RWMX_DWBH, RWMX_DWID, RWMX_BMMC, RWMX_BMBH, RWMX_BMID, RWMX_TBR, RWMX_TBRID, RWMX_TBRQ, RWMX_NOTE, RWMX_SJDH, RWMX_GPS, RWMX_SJLX, RWMX_SJSM, RWMX_JJD, RWMX_TP, RWMX_SP, RWMX_ZH, RWMX_FXSJ, RWMX_SHLX, RWMX_BHLX, RWMX_BHSL, RWMX_KHNR, RWMX_CD, RWMX_CZFS from XCSB where RWMX_ID = #{rwmxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
